changelog:
## Changes in v1.0.38

### Smart Sync with Raw Hash Check
- NEW: Compares MD5 hash of playlist BEFORE parsing
- If unchanged: shows "Nessuna modifica" in ~3 seconds (instead of 30+)
- If changed: performs delta sync as usual
- Applies to both manual sync and auto-update

### Sport Section Fixes
- Fixed: Black loading overlay during transition (no more dashboard flash)
- Fixed: Preview no longer appears when returning from Sport section
- Fixed: Proper cleanup of sport flags when exiting fullscreen
- Fixed: Panels restored correctly when backing from TvGuide

### Previous fixes
- v1.0.37: Sport fullscreen navigation
- v1.0.36: Sync performance improvements
